00002 #define NDARRAY_TABLES_Layout_hpp_INCLUDED

00004 #include <boost/fusion/sequence/intrinsic/size.hpp>
00005 #include <boost/fusion/sequence/intrinsic/value_at.hpp>
00006 #include <boost/fusion/sequence/intrinsic/at.hpp>
00007 #include <boost/fusion/algorithm/iteration/for_each.hpp>
00008 
00009 #include "ndarray/tables_fwd.hpp"
00010 #include "ndarray/tables/detail/TraitsAccess.hpp"
00011 #include "ndarray/tables/Field.hpp"
00012 #include "ndarray/tables/detail/functional.hpp"
00013 
00014 namespace ndarray { namespace tables {
00015 
00016 template <typename T>
00017 class Layout {
00018 public:
00019     typedef typename detail::TraitsAccess<T>::FieldSequence FieldSequence;
00020     typedef typename boost::fusion::result_of::size<FieldSequence>::type Size;
00021 
00022     template <int N>
00023     struct At {
00024         typedef typename boost::fusion::result_of::value_at_c<FieldSequence,N>::type Type;
00025     };
00026 
00027     template <int N>
00028     typename At<N>::Type const &
00029     operator[](Index<N> index) const {
00030         return boost::fusion::at_c<N>(_sequence);
00031     }
00032 
00033     template <int N>
00034     typename At<N>::Type &
00035     operator[](Index<N> index) {
00036         return boost::fusion::at_c<N>(_sequence);
00037     }
00038 
00039     void normalize(bool pack=false) {
00040         detail::SetOffsets function(pack, _bytes, _alignment);
00041         boost::fusion::for_each(_sequence, function);
00042     }
00043 
00044     FieldSequence const & getSequence() const { return _sequence; }
00045 
00046     FieldSequence & getSequence() { return _sequence; }
00047 
00048     int getMinStride() const { return _bytes + _bytes % _alignment; }
00049 
00050     int getBytes() const { return _bytes; }
00051 
00052     int getAlignment() const { return _alignment; }
00053 
00054     explicit Layout() : _sequence(), _bytes(0), _alignment(1) {}
00055 
00056     Layout(Layout const & other) :
00057         _sequence(other._sequence), _bytes(other._bytes), _alignment(other._alignment) {}
00058 
00059     bool operator==(Layout const & other) const {
00060         return _sequence == other._sequence;
00061     }
00062 
00063     bool operator!=(Layout const & other) const {
00064         return _sequence != other._sequence;
00065     }
00066 
00067 private:
00068     FieldSequence _sequence;
00069     int _bytes;
00070     int _alignment;
00071 };
00072 
00073 }} // namespace ndarray::tables
